content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position (x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), a boiler at position (x=111.5 y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position (x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position (x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before using them.
- Make sure to replenish fuel for burner entities when they are low.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
- Make sure to provide the necessary ingredients for entities when they are missing.

### Errors when using entities without being connected to the electric network
- Ensure that entities are connected to the electric network before using them.
- Make sure to connect entities to the electric network when they are not connected.

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before using them.
- Make sure to replenish fluid for pipe groups when they are low.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No variables have been assigned.
